ProfilePage.title: Profile｜Takuya Oshima
ProfilePage.profileText:
Web Designer, Front-end Engineer, Web Director.
Born in 1989.
Worked as a web designer at a web production and development company in Tokyo, Japan, handling design and front-end implementation for numerous website projects.
Often responsible for planning, design creation, front-end implementation, and direction alone, with a strong ability to cover a wide range of tasks.
ProfilePage.serviceText:
Web Planning
Web Direction
Web Design
Frontend Development
SEO
Web Marketing
